entry.title: resetroot99/invOCR: **InvoiceOCR** is a lightweight, scalable, and efficient AI-powered invoice processing system designed for auto repair and collision shops. It enables estimators to **send invoices via email, SMS, or chat apps (Telegram/Discord)** and automatically extracts relevant data, assigns it to ro# and prepares it for posting on estimating platforms).
entry.content: **InvoiceOCR** is a lightweight, scalable, and efficient AI-powered invoice processing system designed for auto repair and collision shops. It enables estimators to **send invoices via email, SMS, or chat apps (Telegram/Discord)** and automatically extracts relevant data, assigns it to ro# and prepares it for posting on estimating platforms).

entry.title: Christopher-Totlyakov/OnlineMovieAPI: What we created with Cloudflare Worker is a Serverless Function running on Cloudflare's edge network. It acts as a lightweight API proxy that processes requests from the React app, fetches data from the OMDb API, and returns the response. This approach enhances security by hiding the API key and improves performance.
entry.content: What we created with Cloudflare Worker is a Serverless Function running on Cloudflare's edge network. It acts as a lightweight API proxy that processes requests from the React app, fetches data from the OMDb API, and returns the response. This approach enhances security by hiding the API key and improves performance.
